title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 73% adherence rate in older adults with transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy using electronic PROs.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven reminders to improve compliance among elderly patients.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: Increasing regulatory pressure for PRO integration in drug trials, expected by Q4 2025.
**CONCERN**: Potential self-selection bias in PRO studies may affect clinical validity.
